traits.name: Aggressive
traits.detail: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed towards an enemy you can see.

traits.name: Martial Advantage
traits.detail: Once per turn you may deal 17 (5d6) extra damage when you hit a target within 5ft of your allies.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The gigantes makes three spear attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage, plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Spit Poison
actions.detail: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [damage/2+1, d6] poison damage, and the target must make a [dc-secondary] CON save or be poisoned (save ends).
